lead_paragraph: In Werner Herzog's new film BAD LIEUTENANT: PORT OF CALL NEW ORLEANS, Nicolas Cage plays a rogue detective who is as devoted to his job as he is at scoring drugs --  while playing fast and loose with the law.  He wields his badge as often as he wiel
